snippet: An Indonesian court rejected a challenge by two Australian drug smugglers facing execution after being convicted in 2006 as the ringleaders of a plot to smuggle heroin out of the country.
abstract: Lawyer for Australian drug smugglers Andrew Chan and Myuran Sukumaran hopes to bring case to constitutional court after death sentences appeal was rejected by Indonesian court.
lead_paragraph: An Indonesian court rejected a challenge by two Australian drug smugglers facing execution after being convicted in 2006 as the ringleaders of a plot to smuggle heroin out of the country.

headline.main: Indonesia: Court Deals a Setback to Two Australians Facing Execution
headline.print_headline: Asia; Indonesia: Court Deals a Setback to Two Australians Facing Execution
